alert.note: Alert for Leon (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 04 at 3:20PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Leon County through 400 PM EDT... At 320 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Florida A and M, moving southwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Tallahassee, Florida A and M, Doak Campbell Stadium, Springsax Park, Lake Bradford, Apalachee Ridge Estates, Leon Sinks, Gaither Community Center, Lake Munson, Walker Ford Community Center, Messer Park, Bragg Stadium, South City, Eight Mile Pond, All Saints District, Jack McLean Park, Callen Neighborhood, North Florida Fairgrounds, Innovation Park and Tallahassee Regional A/P. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
